topic.title: Won't start due to missing sslcrypto module
topic.body:
Thanks for packaging ZeroNet to the Snap Store :D

When I download the package from zeronet.io it works fine in my system. But trying to use the snap didn't work for me. See the details bellow.

### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.7.1 r4469
  * Operating system: Ubuntu 19.10
  * Web browser: Firefox
  * Tor status: disabled
  * Opened port: no

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

```bash
❯ snap run zeronet 
- Please report snap specific errors (e.g. Read-only file system) to: https://github.com/mkg20001/zeronet-snap/issues
- and ZeroNet specific errors to: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues
- Linking plugins...
- Starting ZeroNet...
[15:44:22] PluginManager Plugin CryptMessage load error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'sslcrypto' in PluginManager.py line 138 > CryptMessage/__init__.py line 1 > CryptMessage/CryptMessagePlugin.py line 7 > CryptBitcoin.py line 12
[15:44:22] - Version: 0.7.1 r4469, Python 3.6.9 (default, Nov  7 2019, 10:44:02) 
[GCC 8.3.0], Gevent: 1.4.0
[15:44:22] - Unhandled exception: No module named 'sslcrypto'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/zeronet.py", line 17, in main
    main.start()
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/main.py", line 602, in start
    actions.call(config.action, action_kwargs)
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/main.py", line 133, in call
    back = func(**kwargs)
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/main.py", line 141, in main
    from Ui import UiServer
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/Ui/__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    from .UiServer import UiServer
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/Ui/UiServer.py", line 10, in <module>
    from .UiRequest import UiRequest
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/Ui/UiRequest.py", line 14, in <module>
    from User import UserManager
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/User/__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    from .User import User
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/User/User.py", line 9, in <module>
    from Crypt import CryptBitcoin
  File "/home/diogo/snap/zeronet/common/src/Crypt/CryptBitcoin.py", line 12, in <module>
    import sslcrypto
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'sslcrypto'
---
```

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. snap install zeronet
  2. snap run zeronet
